name: Air Transat A330-243 Winter Takeoff from Calgary (Awesome Sound) ᴴᴰ
description:
Hey everybody, I went spotting yesterday and tried out a new spot. It's pretty close to the action but there's a fence so I don't exactly get a panoramic view, as you can see in the ending. The engine sounds from here are amazing though, just listen to those RR Trents howling on spool-up! Imagine hearing GE-90s from here ;) Hope you enjoy!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/CGTSI
Aircraft registration: C-GTSI
Callsign: Air Transat 472 Heavy
Runway used: 35L
_____________________________________________________

(YF-23 at Museum)
